description: Applies an instantaneous force vector attribute to the velocity attribute. Then updates position based on velocity.
name: @three.applyForce

description: Creates a BufferGeometry using the specified constructor and input nodes as arguments.
Use a fragment shader as a three.js shader pass.
name: FxPass

wpipqoa.value: arguniforms && shaderuniforms && Object.keys(arguniforms).forEach(k => shaderuniforms[k].value = typeof  arguniforms[k] === "object" && Object.hasOwn(arguniforms[k], "value") ? arguniforms[k].value : arguniforms[k]);

description: Creates a BufferGeometry using the specified constructor and input nodes as arguments.

name: @three.geometry_loader

78983lz.value: return !file ? false : (file.type === "application/json" ? file.text() : file.arrayBuffer()).then(data => ({data, name: file.name, type: file.type}));

description: Create an [InstancedMesh](https://threejs.org/docs/?q=insta#api/en/objects/InstancedMesh) templating the `geometry` input, using the `material` input, and with position, scale, rotation, and color taken from the corresponding attributes in the `points_geometry` input.

description: Creates a mesh with the `geometry` and `material` inputs

Creates a basic three.js scene with a camera, renderer, and scene. The `objects` input has the objects of the scene, evaluated every frame - make sure to cache. The `onupdate` input is a runnable with parameters `objects`, `camera`, and `scene` which is run every frame - keep. The `fx` input has effects for an EffectComposer.
name: three.setup

description: Use a background worker to run the runnable. The canvas will no longer be usable from the main thread.
name: @three.worker

description: Creates a basic three.js scene with a camera, webGPU renderer, and scene. The `objects` input has the objects of the scene, evaluated every frame - make sure to cache. The `onupdate` input is a runnable with parameters `objects`, `camera`, and `scene` which is run every frame - keep. The `fx` input has effects for an EffectComposer.
name: three.setup
